property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays a non-foundation card, add 1 card of the same type from your discard pile to your hand. E Discard 1 card: If the discarded card either shares at least 2 resource symbols with your opponent's attack or matches at least 1 keyword with your opponent's attack, that attack gets -X damage. X equals 6 minus the discarded card's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before your opponent would draw or add any number of cards to their hand during the Combat Phase, they do not draw or add any cards to their hand. Add X attacks from your discard pile to your hand. X equals the number of cards your opponent would have drawn or added.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Add 1 attack with a control of 2 or less from your discard pile to your hand. E Commit: Your opponent's split attack gets -X damage. X equals the printed damage of the attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: Until the end of the turn, while this card is in your card pool, after your opponent plays an attack as a Reversal, that attack's damage is reduced to 0. B.B. Hood E Commit 2 foundations: Until the end of the turn, while this card is in your card pool, after your opponent plays any attack, that attack's damage is reduced to 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Whenever this attack or one of its Multiple copies deals damage, you may Add 1 non-foundation card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: B. B. Hood Only - Multiple: 2 - Ranged

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, choose 1 card type in your opponent's card pool. Add 1 card of the chosen type from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays a non-foundation card, add 1 card of the same type from your discard pile to your hand. If your character is B. B. Hood, add 2 cards of the same type to your hand instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent's attack gets -2 damage (minimum 1). If your opponent's character is the opposite gender of your character, their attack gets -4 damage (minimum 1) instead. Only playable if your staging area has at least 1 of each card type that your opponent has in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Choose 1 keyword on your opponent's attack. Add 1 attack card with a matching keyword from your discard pile to your hand. Only playable during your opponent's attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Once per turn, discard the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. E Discard 1 momentum: If your opponent plays any enhance abilities during this Enhance Step, the control check to play your next card this turn is successful (no control check necessary). If you have already resolved this ability this turn, commit this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent does not play any enhance abilities during this Enhance Step, any control checks made to block this attack get -3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent plays an enhance ability, attach the top card of your deck to this card face down. F Commit, discard All cards attached to this card: Either your next control check gets +X or you discard the top X cards of your opponent's deck. X equals the number of cards discarded for the cost of this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard the top X cards of your opponent's deck. This attack gets -X damage. X may not be more than this attack's damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. If they played any enhance abilities during this Enhance Step, discard the top 8 cards instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next control check this turn gets +X. X equals the number of enhances your opponent played during this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent fails a control check, discard the top 2 cards of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card is an attack, add it to your opponent's hand. If the revealed card is not an attack, discard it and you may ready this foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After an attack deals damage and if your opponent played at least 1 enhance during the Enhance Step, your control checks get +2 for the rest of this turn.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: Make a control check. Discard X cards from the top of your opponent's deck. X equals double the number checked.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the amount of damage dealt. If your opponent's character has 'BT: AB', gain 3 additional vitality. E Commit, discard X momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent loses X vitality and you may ready 1 of your foundations that you have not readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent's character becomes 'G: F' for the rest of this turn. Your opponent loses 2 vitality and you gain 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: During your Ready Phase, your opponent loses 1 vitality. R Commit: After your opponent loses vitality due to one of your attacks or card effects, gain X vitality. X equals the amount of vitality they lost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent loses 2 vitality and you gain 2 vitality. Demitri E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent loses 2 vitality and you gain 3 vitality. Only playable if your opponent's character is 'G: F'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E Lose X vitality: If this attack deals damage, the next attack you play this turn gets +X damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the amount of vitality your opponent has lost this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, your opponent loses 1 vitality. If your opponent's character is 'G: F;, you also gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this card: Before you take damage from your opponent's attack, gain X vitality. X equals double your momentum. E Commit: Gain 2 vitality. Only playable if your opponent's character is 'G: F'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 2 momentum: If your attack is not blocked, your opponent loses 3 vitality and you gain 2 vitality.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E Lose X vitality: Your opponent loses vitality equal to half of X (rounded down). X may not be more than your momenum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 card: When an opponent's ability would make you lose vitality, cancel that ability's effects. R Commit 1 foundation: After a player plays their second foundation of the turn, they may not play any more foundations this turn. Either player may play this ability. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Until the beginning of your next turn, All foundations are added to their owner's staging area from their card pool committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When you are losing vitality that is not due to an attack's damage, reduce that loss by 2. During a player's End Phase, if that player did not attempt to play a foundation this turn, commit All of that player's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is added to your momentum from your card pool this turn, add it face up. First F Discard this card from your momentum: Until the beginning of your next turn, players may not play more than X foundations per turn. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent may not play abilities that make you lose vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add it to your staging area and place 3 Ice tokens on it. Remove 1 Ice token from this card at the beginning of each turn. If this card has 0 Ice tokens on it, discard it from your staging area. While this card is in your staging area, players may not play abilities printed on foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Destroy this foundation: Each player may add up to 2 foundations they could normally play from their hand to their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you lose vitality due to one of your opponent's card effects, draw X cards. X equals the vitality you lost.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: F: Each player may add up to 2 foundations they could normally play from their hand to their staging area committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays a foundation, discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card is a foundation, add it to your staging area committed. If not, discard 1 foundation from your opponent's card pool and destroy this foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you play your fourth card this turn, if you have a run of ascending sequential control values 3 cards long (such as 1,2,3 or 3,4,5) in your card pool, the control check for that card is successful (no control check necessary). E Discard 1 momentum: Play 1 enhance printed on a card in any staging area as though it were printed on this character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 character: For the rest of the turn when you attempt to play a card that will create an ascending or descending sequential run in the control values of cards in your card pool that is at least 3 cards long, you do not need to check to play that card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: Once per turn, choose a form printed on a card in your opponent's staging area. Play that form as though it where printed on this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). If the last 4 cards in your card pool have a descending sequential run of control values from 5 to 2, the control check for this card is successful (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Play 1 enhance printed on a foundation in your opponent's staging area as though it where printed on this card, paying no costs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Before you play this card, if it would create a run of ascending or descending sequential control values at least 3 cards long (such as 1,2,3 or 6,5,4,3) in your card pool, the control check for this card is successful (no control check necessary).

card.name: A Singing and Dancing Musical Sister

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 3 momentum: Choose a staging area. For the rest of this turn, you may play any abilities printed on any card in that staging area as though they were printed on this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have a run of ascending or descending sequential control values at least 3 cards long (such as 1,2,3 or 5,4,3,2) in your card pool, discard the first or last card of the run from your card pool.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If the 2 cards preceding this card in your card pool have ascending sequential control values of 1 and 2, discard 1 attack from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 2 momentum: When a response printed on a card in any staging area could be triggered, play that response as though it was printed on this foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the beginning of your Combat Phase remove All Moon tokens on this character, if you did not remove any tokens add 1 Moon token to this character. While this character has at least 1 Moon token on it, your maximum vitality is 33 and when you are taking damage, reduce that damage by 2 (minimum 1). E Discard 1 momentum: If your attack deals damage, gain 5 vitality. Only playable while this character has a moon token on it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain 3 vitality. If you have at least 1 Moon token on your character, gain 5 vitality instead. J. Talbain R Discard 1 momentum: Before you remove a Moon token from your character, leave it on your character instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While you have at least 1 Moon token on your character, when you take damage, reduce that damage by 2 (minimum 1). E Commit: Your opponent's non-weapon attack gets -2 damage.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals your character's hand size minus the number of cards in your hand (to a minimum 0).

property.value: R: After your opponent plays an ability printed on their character card, discard the top 3 cards of their deck. E Commit: Add 2 cards from your discard pile to your hand. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays an ability printed on their character, discard the top X cards of their deck. X equals double your opponent's hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before blocking an attack, choose 1 block in your discard pile and play it as though it were in your hand. Remove that block from the game at the end of this Combat Phase.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, discard the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. If any copies of the attack you played this attack as a Reversal to are discarded, discard an additional 5 cards from the top of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck. Lilith/Morrigan E: If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, add any cards you played as blocks this turn from your card pool to your hand.

property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit X foundations: Gain X vitality. For each point this would take you above your maximum vitality, this attack gets +1 damage. X cannot be greater than 7.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: When your opponent would gain vitality, if they have more vitality than you, cancel that vitality gain.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability to gain vitality that is printed on a card in their staging area, commit All copies of that card.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you successfully make a control check to play a {Fire} card, discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck. If you have less vitality than your opponent, you may destroy this foundation to discard the top 8 cards of their deck instead.

property.value: E: Your opponent's unblockable attack is no longer unblockable.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you play a block this Block Step, you may change your block's zone to any other zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: When an ability would increase the damage of an attack by 2 or more, cancel that ability's effects. R Commit: After you take damage from an attack that dealt more than double its printed damage, play any attack from your hand (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit your character card: After one of your opponent's attacks deals 6 or more damage, choose an attack in your discard pile and play it. If that attack deals damage, your opponent may not play abilities that grant damage bonuses for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 card: After your opponent plays an enhance ability that grants a damage bonus, negate that ability's effects.

property.value: If this card is discarded due to your opponent's card effect, play this attack (no control check necessary). While this card is in your card pool, your opponent may not play abilities that grant damage bonuses.

property.value: F: Once per turn, until the end of your next turn, after a player plays a non-attack card they choose to either commit 1 card in their staging area or discard 1 card from their hand. E: Each player discards the top 4 cards of their deck.

property.name: CardText

Victor First E: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn, when committing foundations to make a control check successful, players must commit 1 additional foundation or the check fails.
